LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.label: Ghoul
LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.description: Ghouls were humans who were unable to enter the shelter during the bombing. Due to radiation exposure, they have increased resistance to radiation. They also gain a bonus to poison resistance. Unfortunately, they are too physically weak to use heavy weapons.
LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.tools.0.label: Left Fist
LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.tools.1.label: Right Fist
LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.tools.2.label: Teeth
LanguageData.VaulTecGhoul.tools.3.label: Head
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.label: Glowing Ghoul
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.description: These are ghouls that have been exposed to massive amounts of radiation, turning them into living conductors of radiation. Glowing Ghouls emit radiation that is dangerous to humans. They can still be dangerous after death.
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.tools.0.label: Left Fist
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.tools.1.label: Right Fist
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.tools.2.label: Teeth
LanguageData.GlowingGhoul.tools.3.label: Head
